document.heading: Unclaimed Property Demutualization Proceeds Technical Correction Amendment Temporary Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-233, the “Unclaimed Property Demutualization Proceeds Technical Correction Amendment Temporary Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-996, and was retained by the Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 21, 2004, and October 5, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 1, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-573 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-233 became effective on March 16, 2005.
